00020 #include "material.h"
00021 
00022 namespace mknix {
00023 
00024 Material::Material()
00025 {
00026 }
00027 
00028 Material::Material(double young_in, double poisson_in, double density_in)
00029   : young(young_in), poisson(poisson_in), density(density_in)
00030 {
00031   lambda = (poisson*young) / ( (1+poisson)*(1-2*poisson) );
00032   mu = young / ( 2*(1+poisson) );
00033   computeD();
00034   computeC();
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 Material::~Material()
00039 {
00040 }
00041 
00042 void Material::computeD( )
00043 {
00044   double comFacD; // Common factor for matrix D.
00045   D.resize(3,3);
00046   // Plain stress case:
00047   comFacD = young / (1 - std::pow(poisson, 2) ); // = E/(1-mu^2)
00048   D(0,0) = 1;
00049   D(0,1) = poisson;
00050   D.writeElement(D.readElement(0,1),1,0);
00051   D(1,1) = 1;
00052   D(2,2) = (1-poisson) / 2;
00053   D *= comFacD; //Apply common factor.
00054 
00055 }
00056 
00057 void Material::computeC( )
00058 {
00059   C.resize(3,3);
00060   // Plain stress case:
00061   C(0,0) = lambda+2*mu;
00062   C(0,1) = lambda;
00063   C.writeElement(C.readElement(0,1),1,0);
00064   C(1,1) = lambda+2*mu;
00065   C(2,2) = mu;
00066 //   cout << lambda << ", " << mu << endl;
00067 //   cout << C << endl;
00068 //   int kk=1; cout << this->getCsym(kk,kk,kk,kk) << endl;
00069 }
00070 
00071 double Material::getCsym( int& i, int& j, int& k, int& l )
00072 {
00073   return (0.25*( Cijkl(i,j,k,l) + Cijkl(i,j,l,k) + Cijkl(j,i,k,l) + Cijkl(j,i,l,k) ) );
00074 }
00075 
00076 double Material::Cijkl( int& i, int& j, int& k, int& l )
00077 {
00078   double res=0.;
00079   if(i==j && k==l) res += lambda;
00080   if(i==k && j==l) res += 2*mu;
00081   return res;
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 void Material::computeS(cofe::TensorRank2Sym<2,double> & S,
00086                         const cofe::TensorRank2<2,double> & F)
00087 {
00088   cofe::TensorRank2Sym<2,double> one;
00089   one.beUnityTensor();
00090   // E = 1/2 (F'F - 1)
00091   E.beTraProductOf(F,F);
00092   E -= one;
00093   E *= 0.5;
00094   // St. Venant Kirchoff:
00095   // S = lambda*tr(E)*1 + 2*mu*E
00096   S = E;
00097   S *= 2*mu;
00098   one *= lambda*E.trace();
00099   S += one;
00100 
00101 }
00102 
00103 double Material::computeEnergy( cofe::TensorRank2Sym<2,double> & S ) const
00104 {
00105 //   cofe::TensorRank2Sym<2,double> one;
00106 //   one.beUnityTensor();
00107 //   S = E;
00108 //   S *= 2*mu;
00109 //   one *= lambda*E.trace();
00110 //   S += one;
00111 //   double energy = 0.5 * S.dot( E );
00112 
00113   double energy = 0.5 * lambda * pow( E.trace(), 2 ) + mu * E.dot( E );
00114   return energy;
00115 }
